questions.question: A triangular plate of b=2.4 m and h=b is y=1.8 m below the free surface of the water and inclining an angle of 39<sup>o</sup> with the free surface of the water. Find the position of centre of pressure. Refer figure in the simulator.

A triangular plate of b=2.8 m and h=b is y=2 m below the free surface of the water and inclining an angle of 42<sup>o</sup> with the free surface of the water. Find the position of centre of pressure. Refer figure in the simulator.
